thread.title: Greater Cleveland Congregations pledges to take battle against Q renovations to Detroit
thread.title_full: Greater Cleveland Congregations pledges to take battle against Q renovations to Detroit

author: Karen Farkas, cleveland.com
title: Greater Cleveland Congregations pledges to take battle against Q renovations to Detroit
text: Greater Cleveland Congregations, which has called for the governments of Cleveland and Cuyahoga County to commit as many tax dollars to neighborhood development as are proposed for renovating Quicken Loans Arena, will take the fight to Detroit, home of Cavs owner Dan Gilbert.
